name: World-News
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: It is a need briefing app that pulls the news from best news sources on the internet based on rss feeds. Though BBC news briefing exists, but it's very limited, it does not read the full news. This will cover the headlines from around the world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
